alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.html_body: You have received a new customer enquiry. Please view this case and update accordingly.
alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.subject: New enquiry - COVID-19 community form

key.label: What is your update, question or request?

case-field::what_is_your_question_or_req.label: What is your update, question or request?

alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.html_body:
In order to progress your case {{ case.reference }}, Your Council have the following question or request for you:​

"{{ case.values.what_is_your_question_or_request.value }}"​

To provide the requested information or evidence please follow this link
alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.subject: Further information required

alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.html_body:
Your case under reference {{ case.reference }} has now been resolved.

If you already have MyAccount, you can view your case at any time.

If you do not, you can sign up to view updates on the progress of your case, submit documents and more.
alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.subject: Query resolved

case-field::what_is_your_question_or_req.label: What is your update, question or request?

alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.html_body:
Your Council have the following update regarding your case {{ case.reference }}:​

"{{ case.values.what_is_your_question_or_request.value }}"​
alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.subject: Your Council have an update on your case​

case-field::what_is_your_question_or_req.label: What is your update, question or request?

alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.html_body:
Your case {{ case.reference }} has been updated regarding the question or request "{{ case.values.what_is_your_question_or_request.value }}"​

 with your response:​
"{{ case.values.customer_response_1.value }}"​
alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.subject: Your Council have received your response​

case-field::what_is_your_question_or_req.label: What is your update, question or request?

alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.html_body:
The customer has responded to case {{ case.reference }} in relation to your query:​

"{{ case.values.what_is_your_question_or_request.value }}"​

Click here to view the updates​
alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.subject: The customer has responded to your message​

case-field::what_is_your_question_or_req.label: What is your update, question or request?

alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.html_body:
It has been 5 days since you sent the customer a message request regarding case {{ case.reference }} and you have not yet received a response.​

Your message was:​

"{{ case.values.what_is_your_question_or_request.value }}"​
​

Please phone the customer to verify that they have received an email with your request for further information or evidence.​

key.label: To staff - no response from customer​

alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.subject: You have not yet received a response to your message​

case-field::what_is_your_question_or_req.label: What is your update, question or request?

alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.html_body:
You have resent the information request for case {{ case.reference }}.​

Message:​

"{{ case.values.what_is_your_question_or_request.value }}"​
alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.subject: You have resent your message to the customer​

alert-email-template::case-type::covid-1.html_body:
A case has been allocated to you. The case reference number is {{ case.reference }}

Click here to view your corresponding case.
